title: Murder at Amicalola
narrative_summary: Local land developer Julian Sterling hosted his annual 'New Year's Moonshine Gala'. At midnight, he toasted to a controversial new deal near the Etowah River. By 2:00 AM, the lodge is on lockdown. It's pouring rain outside.

weapon.name: Poisoned Drink
weapon.description: A drink spiked with cyanide. Smells faintly of peaches and bitter almonds.

body.state: Collapsed, signs of asphyxiation, red clay mud on boots.
body.clothing: Tuxedo with a vintage Bill Elliott racing lapel pin.
